/>
X.ii.4.B.2.e
.
Action to Take on Final Rating Decisions Prepared Under 38 CFR 3.105(e)
Promulgate final rating decisions prepared under
38 CFR 3.105(e)
by
ensuring rating decision data is correctly reflected in the award application, and
making any necessary award adjustments.
References
:  For more information on
final actions related to adverse action proposals, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 3.B.4
, and
promulgating rating decisions in the Veterans Benefits Management System – Awards (VBMS-A), see the
VBMS Awards User Guide
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section B - Authorization for Reductions in Disability Evaluations Under 38 CFR 3.105(e)
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section B
